title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI wrapper around ollama with chat history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s place.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility and reactive streams.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and managing models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, PDF-chat, Next.js, Rust, etc.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to chat with Ollama models.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spin up Ollama containers and run prompts.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and CLI for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from the OpenAPI spec; same coverage as Python.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package exposing Ollama API for macOS/iOS apps with async/await.
